troll.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: an imaginary creature in stories that looks like an ugly person
troll.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: someone who leaves offensive or upsetting messages on the Internet, just in order to get a reaction
troll.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to try to remove something from a river, ocean etc by pulling a rope, line etc through the water
troll.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: Ships towing huge magnets trolled the ocean floor.
I would troll for fish from the rowboat.
troll.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: to try to obtain something by searching, asking people etc
troll.translation[1].definitions[1].exam: Stewart spent hours trolling the Web for information.
troll.translation[1].definitions[2].defi: to leave offensive or upsetting messages on the Internet, just in order to get a reaction
